Fees, limits, order summary, and pertinent market information are provided to give users context for their trades.  TRADERS Retail user Interface contains comparable features, as well as more advanced tools (e.g. charting), and dashboards optimized for more engaged, day-to-day traders and end users.  INSTITUTIONAL USERS Institutional user Interface is designed for professional and/or enthusiast traders. It features a vertical trade ladder with click-to-trade capabilities as well as sophisticated, institution-grade order types. This UI is optimized for minute-to-minute trading and provides end users with a robust set of live market data.
